text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
The French lesson at 5:00 PM tomorrow 
is cancelled because of the teacher's 
circumstances……

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
At 6:30 PM I have a lesson on tea
ceremony, and at 8 PM I have a party to
attend ——

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
As there will be many influential
finance and business figures attending……
I will set aside the time before the tea
ceremony lesson to ascertain the current
economic climate.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
As a member of our clan, I must 
avoid bringing disgrace to our 
name by my actions.
